issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body:
{code}
tor

This message was automatically generated.

GitHub user steveloughran opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/56

    MAPREDUCE-6475 cleanup 

    This rebase on trunk cleans up `TestRMContainerAllocator.testAttemptNotFoundCausesRMCommunicatorException`
    
    MAPREDUCE-6439 has probably fixed the underlying problem; all that's left of this patch is a stop of the mock rm; minor

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/steveloughran/hadoop jenkins/MAPREDUCE-6475-test-failure

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/hadoop/pull/56.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #56
    
----
